error.forbidden.body: You are not allowed to access this page.
error.locked.body: Please close all browser windows to finish logging out.
error.method-not-allowed.body: The request method is not supported for this page.
error.not-found.body: The page you requested does not exist.
error.post-not-allowed-body: Form submissions to this page are not allowed.
error.unauthorized.body: You must be logged in to access this page.
